net.sf.mmm.service.base.server

Class GenericRemoteInvocationCallHandler<CALL extends RemoteInvocationCall>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.service.base.server.GenericRemoteInvocationCallHandler<CALL>
  • Type Parameters:
    CALL - is the generic type of the RemoteInvocationCall.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AttributeReadId<String>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GenericRemoteInvocationCommandCallHandler, GenericRemoteInvocationRpcCallHandler

    public abstract class GenericRemoteInvocationCallHandler<CALL extends RemoteInvocationCall>
extends Object
implements AttributeReadId<String>
    This is the abstract base class for a generic handler to invoke RemoteInvocationCalls from the client on the server-side.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

      • invoke

        public abstract Object invoke(CALL call)
                       throws Exception
        Invokes the given RemoteInvocationCall.
        Parameters:
        call - is the RemoteInvocationCall to execute.
        Returns:
        the result of the invocation.
        Throws:
        Exception - if anything goes wrong.

      • validate

        public void validate(CALL call)
              throws Exception
        Performs a (pre-)validation of the given RemoteInvocationCall. Will typically be called outside a transaction. Complex business and state validation that requires a transaction has to be performed inside the actual invocation.
        Parameters:
        call - is the RemoteInvocationCall to validate.
        Throws:
        Exception - if the given call is invalid.

      • doValidate

        protected abstract Set<? extends javax.validation.ConstraintViolation<?>> doValidate(CALL call)
        Called from validate(RemoteInvocationCall) to delegate to JSR303 (javax.validation).
        Parameters:
        call - is the RemoteInvocationCall to validate.
        Returns:
        the Set of ConstraintViolations. Will be empty if valid.
